biography: Geraldine Leigh Chaplin is an English-American actress and writer. The daughter of Charlie Chaplin and Oona O'Neill.  Geraldine has appeared in a large number of critically acclaimed English, French, and Spanish language films. Her film debut was in "Limelight" (1952) and breakthrough in David Lean's  "Doctor Zhivago" (1965) as Tonya.
name: Geraldine Chaplin
